title: NegotiationContext (NC)
description: Schema for the Negotiation Context, defined by the Requester Agent (a_req) to guide candidate selection and negotiation in ACNBP. It's a set of parameters and constraints.

desiredCapabilityId.description: The primary capability a_req is seeking (e.g., 'DocumentTranslation').

skillIdPattern.description: ID or pattern for a required skill.

requiredSkills.description: Specific skills or types of skills a_req requires.

costConstraints.description: Maximum acceptable costs or preferred pricing models.

requiredSecurityFeatures.description: List of mandatory security features (e.g., ['End-to-End Encryption']).

trustPolicyUrl.description: URL to a_req's detailed trust policy.

contextualParameters.description: Other capability-specific or task-specific parameters (e.g., 'target_language': 'Japanese', 'document_sensitivity': 'High_Legal_Confidential' for DocumentTranslation).

preferredProtocols.description: List of communication protocols preferred or supported by a_req.

executionDeadline.description: Optional: Deadline for the completion of the task.
